game.name: Test your knowledge: Dogs
game.shortDescription: Is a test game that will test your knowledge of different breeds of dogs. Do you know what a variety of dog breeds look like? German shepherd, Labrador Retriever, English bulldog, Poodle, Golden Retriever, Chihuahua, and many others. Test yourself with our interesting test
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a test game that will test your knowledge of different breeds of dogs. Do you know what a variety of dog breeds look like? German shepherd, Labrador Retriever, English bulldog, Poodle, Golden Retriever, Chihuahua, and many others. Test yourself with our interesting test

reviewHighlights.text: 48 of 51 you can test your knowledge & learn from mistakes (sadly some dogs are missing like Irish Wolfsdog or German Dogge) but its fine
Good test your knowledge game. I do know my dog breeds. Game is too short though. Would like to see more depth in the next game. Great little time was...
